entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 6. Forecast issued 8:24 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High zero.

Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:24 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023
